description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/7779143044 at Mon Sep  9 14:50:21 UTC 2024

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_1h{component="$component",environment="$environment",fqdn="$fqdn",monitor="global",shard="$shard",stage="$stage",type="$type"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_5m{component="$component",environment="$environment",fqdn="$fqdn",monitor="global",shard="$shard",stage="$stage",type="$type"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="$component",monitor="global",shard="$shard",type="$type"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_1h{component="$component",environment="$environment",fqdn="$fqdn",monitor="global",shard="$shard",stage="$stage",type="$type"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="$component",monitor="global",shard="$shard",type="$type"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_30m{component="$component",environment="$environment",fqdn="$fqdn",monitor="global",shard="$shard",stage="$stage",type="$type"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="$component",monitor="global",shard="$shard",type="$type"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_6h{component="$component",environment="$environment",fqdn="$fqdn",monitor="global",shard="$shard",stage="$stage",type="$type"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="$component",monitor="global",shard="$shard",type="$type"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.content:
The SLO for this service will determine the thresholds (indicated by the dotted lines)
in the following graphs. Over time, we expect these SLOs to become stricter (more nines) by
improving the reliability of our service.

**For more details of this technique, be sure to the Alerting on SLOs chapter of the
[Google SRE Workbook](https://landing.google.com/sre/workbook/chapters/alerting-on-slos/)**
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Multi-window, multi-burn-rates

The alert will fire when both of the green solid series cross the green dotted threshold, or
both of the blue solid series cross the blue dotted threshold.
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Single window, 1h/5m burn-rates

Removing the 6h/30m burn-rates, this shows the same data over the 1h/5m burn-rates.

The alert will fire when the solid lines cross the dotted threshold.
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Single window, 6h/30m burn-rates

Removing the 1h/5m burn-rates, this shows the same data over the 6h/30m burn-rates.

The alert will fire when the solid lines cross the dotted threshold.
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Single window, 1h/5m burn-rates, no thresholds

Since the threshold can be relatively high, removing it can help visualise the current values better.
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Single window, 6h/30m burn-rates, no thresholds

Since the threshold can be relatively high, removing it can help visualise the current values better.
panels.title: Help

title: alerts: Global Node-Aggregated SLI Metrics Apdex SLO Analysis
